kalsiyam, posparas wani khija walin ha witamin bi ha si walin pohosath jambola aahara ruchiya wadi kirima, aamashagatha roga samanaya kirima, diyawadiyawa palanaya kirima, sama nirogimathwa thabima wani aushadhiya gunayangen yukthaya.

samahara guwan sewa hotalayakin hotalayakata kelin ma bag yawiya haki paridi sewawan sapayima arambaa athi athara thama bagaya me mohothe aththe kumana thanaka dayi danaganimata haki paddhathiyak da idiriye di guwan sewa handunwa denu athi bawa apeksha kerenawa.

awapasa sapath sanda madale dubala aalokayen pawa dadayakkaraya me piwisa sitinuye thaman methuwak kisima dineka paya nogasu bhumi bhagayakata bawa sakahara daththeya.me bhumi bhagaya pilibandawa wadi manath thorathuru danaganu risiyen siya piya banawa ee pilibandawa wimasimata sith wuwada, ese kota piya samawada sitina dahana bindimata dadayakkaraya ruchi nowiya.thaman athapath wu kisiseth watahagatha nohaki wuwada eheth kisidu sakayekin thorawa apurwa saha anupameya wu hakiyawa nisa piyanan pasupasa piyawara mannada das piyagath kenehi piyage muhuna dadayakkarayage sithehi andigiye anayasayeni.piyage muhunehi randi dadi adhishtanathmaka wesa menma kelinma idiriya bala piya manina ohuge dasehi wu sanwegayen paripiditha balma da ohu banawa wisthara wimasimata dadayakkaraya pasubata karawiya.eheth ee samangama sithata wan apurwa sithuwillak ohuge muwata manda sinahawak nanwimata samath wiya.piyanan ge muhuna sithehi mawa gath ohu ewara thathkale maha dadayakkarayage sithata piwisa owunge gamane ilakkaya wi bhumi bhagaya pilibanda thorathuru laba ganimataya.

pothgula parwagathayasarakala his lenak sahitha galamatha kapapugalin kala thawath kuda gal geyak athi pothgulayayi pawasanamehi pasugiya awasthayeka sanghayawahansenamak wanayehi thibena bawada kiyath, meyadabala lena idiriyen galatananga dakunu desatamagos pahathatabasa palamugiya waw kandabatama paminenu (salakiyayuththak; “jayashrira maha bodhi shakhawa nawthotasita anurapurata wadamawimedi thiwangka nam bamunu gamdoratuyehi wada hindawu bawa saha ema sthanayehi dewanapathis nirindu sesathin puda abhishekadun palaruha bodhi angkurayak ropanayakara wiharayaki karawu bawada, ithihasagathaweth, “thanthriwamala” nam mehi ihathin dakwudeya hara wiharadi godanagili karmahanthayanta ayath kisith daknata nathimuth wanasathun pawa kelidelen prihathisuwa gathakota thibena bawata lakunathi darshawanayata pawa durlbha tharam wishalathwanayen yuth chiththabhi ramaniya galthala thunakda, eyata madhyayehi ramaniyaාkarayen pihiti jarawasa wawakda weth, wathura basayamadiyen sadi bambaaganan durathi dushkara sthana “arippu” pare 7 k saha “thanthrimamala” pare 3 kda weth.
